1.content: Is this aware or unaware?
1.title: Pick ur path!

111.content: Alright, you are yourself, which series are you in.
111.title: Yourself?

1112.content: Next Question: Are you male or female
1112.title: Dragon Ball Z

11122.content: Ok then, which one the giant ladies find you?
11122.title: Female

112.content:
So ur Vegeta and ur about half an inch tall.

What series r we in?
112.title: Vegeta

11232.content:
So ur Vegeta shrunken to half an inch tall.

Who finds u?
11232.title: Dragon Ball Super

112321.content:
U wake up all dizzy and can't remember what happened and u look around to try to figure out where u r as u slowly overcome the dizziness u relize u shrunk and ur on the sidewalk near a house that u know to be the home of Android 18 and Kirilin, but since Kirilin left for his 5year training with King Kai and he left 2 weeks ago. Durring that 2 weeks Android 18 has been so depressed and has been avoiding everyone. Suddenly u see the door open as 18 comes out and locks the door behind her, she's wearing a verry small shirt with a short skirt with no panties. Out of no where 18 flies half way down the sidewalk then starts walking down the sidewalk, u tried to move but just now notice that u r stuck in a piece of gum on the ground as 18 gets closer and closer u start freaking out trying to get free to avoid death. U look up and see the bottom of 18's gym shoe when suddenly she backs her foot away from the tiny Vegeta and bends down and takes him out of the gum and slips her foot out of her shoe and says 'u know Vegeta I was wondering when this would happen to u! From now on u r now my new insole!' With that she gives him a sly grin as she drops him into her shoe and then puts it back on with him inside and continues her walk.

Whats next?
112321.title: Android 18

114.content: Gohan then, which series will it be?
114.title: Gohan

choices: Something breaks though the wall into the room.
121.content:
Ur name is Adam ur 23 and one day ur walking though the woods just smoking a cig going to the lake where u have ur fishing gear set up for a relaxing day of fishing, when suddenly u get light headed and dizzy u stumble ur way to a tree to hold urself up then u black out. When u come to u look around and relize ur in a strange room, and u notice that everything is giant sized u turn around and see a gargantuan mirror and relize that everything isn't big, u shrunk to what u believe to be around half an inch tall.

What happens next?
121.title: Yourself?

info.brief_description: This is an giantess story for all dragon ball shows!
info.description:
This is a story for all Dragon Ball, Dragon Ball Z, Dragon Ball GT, And Dragon Ball Super.


Please Add!


If u want to use any reserved choices that haven't been used yet email me and link me to the one u wanna use and I will see if u can! And if u wanna provide pics for any or all characters for ea chapter email me about it link the chapter and url of the pic with location u want the pic put in the chapter and if it is appropriate enough I will add it in! And I will send u a reward for supporting this story along with giving u credit for providing it!


RULES:
* If u wanna add something to this story but don't want it under ur name for all to see and know, just email me about it and we can arrange a way to get it added!
* If u either want anything u added on here to be edited or removed just email me about it link the chapter(s) involved and explain ur reasoning y and we will go from there!
* Almost anything goes.
* Except no male giants the tiny has to stay tiny at all times.
* If u r not sure of what u want to add is allowed just email me and tell me what it is and I will find a way to help u anyway I can to make it fair for all!
* Correct grammar and spelling doesn't matter for the most part but please try to make it understandable for all.
* If I see any chapter that I can't understand the grammar and or spelling in I will first email the adder and try work together with u to try and fix/edit it.
* If u mess up in any chapter or on the choices email me about it and link me to it and i will edit the spelling for u as long as u tell me what the right spelling/choices r so I can fix it and save the edit.
* First Edit/Fix for any chapter is free for each user after that I will charge 10gp for each time after.
* First requested chapter removal is free for each user after that I will charge 100gp each time after.
* More will be added as needed.
